name: CornishPhrases
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Listen to daily phrase updates in Cornish. You can just say "Alexa, what's today’s Cornish phrase". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
